author: gumb00
content: Good point, they should be validated at stack validation, not throwing stack underflow exceptions

author: axic3354
content: Sorry forgot to respond, yes absolutely it should, but we never updated it beyond EIP-3540 support.

author: axic3354
content: I think going forward we'll just add that updated version in the "megaspec" and then we can slowly float back the changes into the EIPs.
